post.author: K. Kwon
post.content:
From:        "Christian Harris" <harris@gurulink.ca>  Add to Address BookAdd to Address Book
To:        kwon96@yahoo.com
Subject:        Java Provisioning /OSS
Date:        Mon, 20 Jun 2005 18:16:42 -0400

Hey Fred


I wanted to ask a favour, and see if you know anyone who be able to
help me
out. I am currently looking for a Senior Java Developer to working in
Provisioning/OSS. The role would require in-depth knowledge of NMS and
EMS
(Element Management Systems) and ideally the Northbound Interface....

Here is a description:

>Here is a link to the full job description:
>http://www.gurulink.ca/jobview.asp?JobID=418

Does anyone come to mind at all?

Your help is greatly appreciated as usual

Take care and please keep in touch!

Chris


.........................
Christian Harris
Senior Consultant

w.  416.644.8855
www.gurulink.ca
GuruLink Incorporated
100 King St. West (37th Floor), First Canadian Place, Toronto, Ontario,
M5X
1C9

=========================================================
Job Title:         Java Provisioning Developer
Location:         Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Posted:         2/8/2005
Expires:         4/8/2005
Starting:         ASAP
Type:         Permanent
Travel:         minimal
Dress Code:         Business Casual

Must Have Skills:

> 5+ years of industry experience in s/w design and development
> 4+ years of Java/J2EE, JSP, JDBC, Struts, Servlet, EJB, Web development experience in a Unix environment
> 3+ years of formal OO design experience (RUP Rational)
> Experienced with Java based persistence frameworks
> Strong EMS experience with OSS
> Experience with north bound OSS interface
> Experience with Tomcat
> Oracle (pl/sql)
> SOAP/XML
> University degree in engineering, computer science or related education
> Strong understanding of, and experience with, formal software development processes
> Experience with object modeling, CASE tools and UML
> Strong written and oral communications skills
> Experience working in a fast paced environment
> Experience working on commercial software products

Nice to Have Skills:

> TogetherSoft Control Center
> building commercial software products
> OSS systems and integration
> SIP, VOIP, CTI, telephony is beneficial

Job Description:

> Design and develop key components of Web-based provisioning system
> Enhance and extend the design of the existing provisioning and configuration system
> Provide work estimates and input to the project plans for software development
> Design, write, unit test, and document, and resolve bugs in software
> Ensure that the software meets product specifications and work within formal SDLC
post.title: Java Provisioning /OSS
